text:
Thank you, Bhai.
Thank you for teaching me a lot about hard work and persistence.
Thank you for the mind-blowing inputs in all of the projects.
Thank you for making all the time spent in the Humanoid room so memorable.
Thank you for lifting the spirits of Roboclub and making it a genuinely good place.
Thank you, brother . . . . 

Milenge hum zaroor . . . . . .
author: Ratnangshu  Das

text:
Wing cricket to UNO to IPL to Ind losing to NZ :'(  . . . .  abhi yaadon ki list banane jaunga toh khatam hi nhi hoga . . . 

Toh instead of listing memories let me say you were one of the nicest and most hard-working guys I met there and tera love and passion for running really inspires me a lot . . . .

Hopefully last much mahine saath mein hi guzarenge and fir aage toh milte rahenge . . . .
author: Ratnangshu  Das

text:
You were one of the most well-arranged and meticulous guys I have met, which is very rare in IITs. Kabhi kabhi overconfidence mein hag deta tha, but there jaisa sincere both kam hi dekha h. Also itna saaf kaise rakh leta tha room. . . .

And AOB KS . . . will really miss those PUBG nights. 

Unfortunately is bar nhi mile, but hopefully future trip pe milenge.
author: Ratnangshu  Das

text:
AOB KS . . . Kaafi miss kiya tereko . . . especially your amazing wicketkeeping skills in wing cricket and your student search abilities ;) 

From those endless PUBG nights to those bulla sessions . . . boht zyada hi memories h tere sath and it will be impossible to list all of them . . . 

But honestly . . . you were one of the most calm and collected guys I have seen there and I really admire how hardworking you were . . . bas thoda over-confidence pe kaam karna h tujhe :p 

Anyways . . . BGMI coming soon and so will AOB domination <3 <3
author: Ratnangshu  Das

text:
Yoo Moond.
Chalta firta imdb h tu. Wing cricket se leke bulla sessions. You have given us a lot of memories to cherish. From Psych to the classic "nimbu --> dahi" jokes, you have given us a lot of laughs.

And I have huge respect for you. You were the butt of many of our jokes, but you gracefully handled all of them, which not a lot of people can do. So keep up the good spirit and hopefully jldi kisi trip pe milenge.
author: Ratnangshu  Das

text:
Brother . . . . 

Takneek mein raat bhar soldering karna se leke roomie tak . . . kaafi memories di h. Probably the most helpful guy and hardworking individual I have met in a long time. 

Milenge future mein kahi trip pe <3
author: Ratnangshu  Das

text:
Abb kya hi likhu . . . . 
A lot of good memories from FAC. Also tujhe hall take chodne jana only to prove that "Chivalry is not dead" . . . XD
But there liye dhang ka "nickname" dhund hi nhi paya and you kept on calling me "Bengoli" .. . ;-;

Anyways take care and Hyderabad ka Biryani pending h
author: Ratnangshu  Das

text:
Yo Bhai . . . . 
Humanoid mein kaafi time spent kiya . . . and tbh you were one of the most intelligent and sincere guy I had met. But again you were the same guy who used to come up with "Esscel" kinda things . . . iykyk. Aise dual personality ka raaz kya h . . . lol.

Jokes apart . . . You abhay and madhur had really lifted the spirits of robo club and I will always be thankful to all 3 of you for that. Keep up with your hard work and baade aadmi banne ke baad bhul mat jana.
author: Ratnangshu  Das

text: Bhai . . . .
author: Ratnangshu  Das

text:
yooo bhai . . . .
Cheers to all the time spent doing "artwork" together :p 
Shayad first year see hi hum fac mein saath mein the and jab bhi club jaana hota that toh tujhe hi call lagata tha ki cycle stand pe mil . . . club jaana toh almost band hi ho gaya, but will miss you a lot. All the best for the future . . .
author: Ratnangshu  Das

text:
Humanoid mein mile the first time . . . lol . . . seems like a whole different life. Not a lot of time there, but definitely enough to realise how hardworking and intelligent you were. Shahsi ka code see like ROS, sab tu hi karta that tab.

But still mech mein kaafi memories (not just memories :) ) share kiye and end take collaboration atut raha.
author: Ratnangshu  Das

text:
Yoo bhai . . . 

I don't remember ki kab pehli baar mile the, but feels like you were always there. JRK ke ki class mein boredom dur karne mein kaafi help kiya. Roz alag alag games ki suggestion lata tha. And mech mein waise collaborations ke liye bhi thank you.

Also a lot of memories through those crazy pubg games . . . lol. Abhi toh pubg aane ke baad virtually milte rahenge.
author: Ratnangshu  Das

text:
LG . . .  
Xin . . . 


But Jokes apart. Kafi intelligent h tu. In spite of wasting all the time playing with us, you still managed to succeed amazingly and that's a sign of sheer brilliance. But uske sath "Bhola" bhi h , which counters all of that IRL.
Anyways, thank you for all the good memories and content for VBK. 

Milte h kahi foreign trip pe ;-;
author: Ratnangshu  Das

text:
Cheers to all the PUBG and Valo nights. Asli pro to tu hi tha . . . . 

JK Noov

text:

author: Ratnangshu  Das

text:
Yo Haga . . . 

I don't know if you remember, first-year mein "startup " ka plan leke html sikhne chale the hum. Lol.
But you gave me a lot of memories to cherish. From wing crickets, to our trip. 
Also both much sikha bhi h. Hardworking, persistent and focused. You have all the golden qualities. Just pose dena sikh ja, fir Korea mein macha dega . . .
author: Ratnangshu  Das

text:
Bhai . . . .
Kaafi kam kiye tere sath humanoid mein and sach mein tere jaisa humble insaan kabhi nhi dekha. With that modest attitude, you were so hardworking and your dedication towards the work was very inspiring . . . BHai pura bhadosa h tujh pe ki both age jayega tu . . . bas bhul mat jaana xd
author: Ratnangshu  Das

text:
Aur bhai . . . . 
Cheers to all the days spent together in Humanoid room . . . 
Humanoid ke bahar zyada interact nhi kiya tujhse, but the time spent together was enough for me to realize how hardworking and focused you were towards the work and it really inspired me a lot. Your dedication towards your work is immense and I am very sure you will reach massive heights in the days to come .  . . bas bhul mat jana  . . . xd
author: Ratnangshu  Das

text:
Yo Inshu . . . 
Don't remember first time kab mulakat hui thi . . . but ig we were in the same TA101 group . . . lol
But throughout the time spent . . . mostly in the robotics club, your hard-working mentality and dedication towards all the work you did inspire me a lot. You were one of the nicest persons I met on campus and pura bharosa h tujh par that you will reach massive heights in your career.
Hopefully milenge kabhi future mein . . .
author: Ratnangshu  Das

text:
Aur Bhai . . . 
A lot of good memories to cherish from humanoid. You were probably the most mature and responsible of all of us. Yet to hi tha jo bina soche samjhe kuch bhi extreme mazaak kar deta that . . . lol.   But above all, you were a good human being and it was great to have a friend like you. 
Also, thanks to you, Abhay and Neil, Roboclub pe itna mehant karne ke liye and improving the quality of work and atmosphere there.
author: Ratnangshu  Das

abb yaadein kya hi likhu . . . there are too many good memories to jot down in such a small place. Kaafi kuch sikha h tujhse. You worked too hard and are prolly very hard rn as well. But still managed a lil bit time for the bulla sessions with your insightful inputs. 

Baas bade aadmi banke bhul mat jana . . . . . .

text:

First time ig humanoid room mein hi mila tha . . . fir through robotics club and department . . . long time. And throughout that time, your hard work, dedication and maturity towards your work has inspired me a lot. Hope you get all the success that you absolutely deserve and aage milenge kabhi . . . 

Cheers to our saffron stigma separator :p
author: Ratnangshu  Das

text:
Aree bhai . . . .
You are probably the most sincere student I have met. Itna kaise padh lete ho. Abhi bhi yaad h, thermo mein jab hum sir ke notes khole bhi nhi the, tu book ke peeche problems solve karne laga tha. In fact hume toh book ka pata bhi nhi tha.
But achha h. Tumhare jaise sincere students hi desh ka naam raushan karenge . . . . . .
author: Ratnangshu  Das

text:

You were one of the nicest human beings I came across on campus . . . .

text:
Yooo Ramu . . . 

As a roommate boht padeshan kiya h tujhe, but you as a Pingala-coordi madat karte raha h . . . Sorry and Thank you sabke liye

Tere saath cricket dekhna boht miss karunga . . .  but tu dar mat . . . IPL discord pe saath me hi dekhenge

Jokes apart . . .  boht mehenati and mature h tu and I am sure kaafi aage jayega tu . . .  jaldi mileneg fir

And . . . Ashok ka dhyaan rakhna :p
author: Ratnangshu  Das

text:
Helloo bhai . . . . 

Orientation mein baju mein baithne se leke ek dum last tak . . . kaafi lamba safar tha. Cheers to all the shared group practicals. You really helped a lot in all of them, from manufacturing the chair to all those mechanical experiments. 
But most importantly you taking notes on recycled white sheets attached to your board helped us all improve at least a grade . . . . XD

Jokes apart, you were one of the nicest human beings I met there and your will to do good for the society really inspires me a lot. Pura bharosa h ki aage both chaapega tu zindagi mein . . . 

Bas thoda aashirvaad kar dena ki tere jaisa achha insaan ban saku.
author: Ratnangshu  Das

text: chaapu launde . . . .
author: Ratnangshu  Das

text: GAWD
author: Ratnangshu  Das

text:
Yoo bhaiii . . . . 
Shayad thermo ke last bench ke quiz se start hui thi . . . and end tak chalti rahi "collaboration" . . . XD

Jokes apart, you are a very hardworking guy and very mature and I believe you will reach amazing heights in the days to come. Hope, jaldi mulakat hoga firse!!!
author: Ratnangshu  Das

text:
Aree mech bhai . . . . 
Abb ye toh yaad nhi ki kaunse course se collab start hua tha but ekdum end tak continue zaroor hua! Thank you for all the support . . . XD
And also Hail AUTOMAT.

Jokes apart, you were one of the most hard-working and intelligent guys I came across in the past 4 years. In spite of all this brilliancy, you were so down to earth and a good human being overall. And I have immense respect for you for all these qualities. 

Anyways, chapter raho future mein bhi and hope aage mulakat hote rahe!!!
author: Ratnangshu  Das

text:
So basically . . . .

Quoting someone: "We are always ALWAYS in touch! Ye memoir wagera ki jarurat nhi. Its for them jinko yaad nhi karne wale."
author: Ratnangshu  Das

text:
Met first time in water polo . . . lol.
A long way from there. You have succeeded and showed your maturity in ways I could never imagine. 
While I am very sure you will do great things in your life, AOB.MMC toh alag hi  banda lagta h. Cheers to all the great PUBG memories (all 4 of us stuck at different places in Livik map and facing a slow zone death . . . lol).

Hopefully future mein milenge
author: Ratnangshu  Das
